```{r}
spiral_initialize(xlim = c(as.numeric(as.Date("1850-01-01")), as.numeric(as.Date("2021-12-31"))), polar_lines_gp = gpar(col = "white", lty = 3))
spiral_track(ylim = c(0, 1), background_gp = gpar(col = NA, fill = "grey90"))
spiral_rect(
  xleft = plot_data$start_date_num,
  xright = plot_data$end_date_num,
  ybottom = 0,
  ytop = 1,
  gp = gpar(fill = plot_data$value, col = plot_data$value)
)
```

```{r}
# Generate a sequence of dates
start_date <- min(power_rangers_episodes$air_date)
end_date <- max(power_rangers_episodes$air_date)
dates <- seq(start_date, end_date, by = "days")

# Convert dates to numeric
date_nums <- as.numeric(dates - start_date)

# Calculate spiral coordinates
spiral_data <- tibble(
  date = dates,
  date_num = date_nums,
  angle = sqrt(date_nums) * 0.1,  # Adjust spiral tightness
  radius = sqrt(date_nums) / 10,  # Adjust spiral spread
  x = radius * cos(angle),
  y = radius * sin(angle)
)

# Plot the spiral
ggplot(spiral_data, aes(x = x, y = y, color = date)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Dates Organized in a Spiral", x = "X", y = "Y") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```
